name: Fedora Man
description:
2D platformer made for the Games Plus Jam, in app. (hour)24*1.5... 

It sucks, really, there is no goal, but there is some weird AI.. But i mean, you can throw fedoras and manipulate time (In a way that definitely wasn't stolen from super hot), in other words, be a badass... So i suppose its okay:)

Time moves faster when you move.
Move with w and a, throw a fedora with the arrow keys.
